website_summaries.verdict: A good way to improve the sound of a typical car audio system without investing in a new stereo.
pros: Provides just the basic components for better sound
The pair of 6-inch coaxial speakers fits a number of car audio systems that use front speakers only
The speakers offer better volume, a higher dynamic range, and more durability
cons: Speakers require professional installation in order to work correctly

customer_reviews.title: Audio Engineer here.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best car audio speakers I have ever heard. So good that I went ahead got two more pairs. One more for the van and another for my Bike. The range is amazing, you can hear every little piece of the music, all the fuck-ups, and all the little nuances.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually post reviews unless I have something bad to say about the product
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually post reviews unless I have something bad to say about the product. I bought these in December and they didn't fit my vehicle and I just installed them into another car this past week. These are by far the best speakers I've ever purchased for a car. The highs, lows and bass are awesome. I can only assume that the one star reviews are from people who don't have a stereo that can push the power needed. If you have a decent aftermarket stereo, buy these you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: good price for 5way speaker
customer_reviews.text: good price for 5way speaker.. tried to install them to my camry 2014 front . but these were too big to fit front.. so I just installed to rear.. used Metra 82-8149 for front speaker adaptor .. but there is nothing for rear adaptor .. had to use my Metra 82-8146 for rear which is not that fit but I did some modification.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great value-priced speakers
customer_reviews.text: They look good, sound even better, and the price is excellent. If you have a couple of bucks laying around and want to upgrade the sound on your factory system without replacing the head unit, get these. On my 2001 Malibu, I need a slightly larger hole to get them to fit; a large rubber mallet gave me the needed clearance.
customer_reviews.author: James Goodman

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I put in a new retrosound radio and amp with these speakers in the back deck, sound is horrible. They start to distort not even half cranked! I've heard people were getting bootleg copies sent to them so I guess ill check them close and repost.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all was suppose to be brand new no ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all was suppose to be brand new no they was used. Animal hair in the speakers and drill marks to mount.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more bass
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more bass. I am only pushing 25W per channel but still I figured it should sound a little better.
customer_reviews.author: JA KY

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers for my Nissan Rogue
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers. Fit my 2010 Nissan Rogue. Just put em in but so far they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: David Oleksy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fidelity..  but one speaker died after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feeling with this speakers. It was not that easy to make it fit to my Toyota Camry 2010 but at the end they delivered a great sound without any amplifier. Sadly, after a year of use withour any complaint one of the speaker died. i am considering to get a diffent speakers
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome. I do not have any amplifier running to them and they are still great.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: my car sounds great! these gotta be one of the best 6/9's ever, 5 way! how do u go wrong with that?! u can't, i don't know how u can complain at all about this speaker. highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: They Rock
customer_reviews.text: These Rock. I put them in my Saddlebags on my Haley Road Glade and they sound Great..

customer_reviews.text: I like these 5 way speakers they have really Christmas sound

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of speakers. Sound is great they won’t disappoint

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear sound. Hooked to a 800 watt amp. They sound great in the door panels of my regular cab pickup. Bass is good, but does not hit like a sub. Will likely add a 10 or 12 inch sub to get more powerful bass.
customer_reviews.author: The Kernel

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: The sound and ease of installation that you’ve came to expect from Pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get over how clear they sound, only issue I had was they were about a half inch deeper than my old pioneer 3 ways, which made it a b#$ch to try to install on my 99 dodge ram 2500. The speakers hit the window track guide. Had to be very creative there.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT

customer_reviews.text: Sounds great.Highs are super clear but only if you cut the bass down a little.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the product. Great sound, loud and very clear. Want to get another set later.

customer_reviews.title: Must have

customer_reviews.title: Cheep and loud and clear!!!!

customer_reviews.text: pretty loud tweeters and good mids i have them amped and they give clear sound at full volume!(the do ear poping)

customer_reviews.title: Great product, box was crushed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price was just right. Give these plenty of power they sound fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Lacking in bass, but that's due to it being a 5 way speaker. If you're wanting a little more bump, go with a 2 way or 3 way design, or a subwoofer. The 2 star review is more for the seller. Supposed to be "like new" and tested speakers... nope. Only was able to use one of the speakers shipped. The other one's rubber ring was ripped from the package.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: out in 32 days
customer_reviews.text: These speakers started out great until on one of the speakers the tweeters went out. The thing is you only have 30 days to return and on the 32nd day they went out. Don't buy these speakers because you have 30 days and after that your on your own.............Then i talk to Amazon and they said its nothing they can do. So I'm out of money and a bad speaker.
customer_reviews.author: CONRAD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. I had some Kenwood 6x9 in my 69 chevy pickup at first and they just didn't hold up . Pioneer sound quality is above and beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E Day

customer_reviews.title: Be extremely careful when purchasing online and triple check what you purchase.
customer_reviews.text: After further inspection and not happy with the way they sound,i noticed that i was given the wrong model speakers and potentially "bootleg brand speakers".knock off brand.i can't seem to find the model on the back of the magnet "ts-a6996s".
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, no where near what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, no where near what I was looking for or hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Trapp

customer_reviews.title: 5 and couldn’t be more pleased. Produced way more mid ranged bass and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a set of Polk audio 6.5 and couldn’t be more pleased. Produced way more mid ranged bass and the vocals came in much clearer. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lyner Lyner

customer_reviews.title: Though sold as model "TS-A6996R" it was instead the "TS-A6996S" (reasoning for the 4/5 star review)
customer_reviews.text: Though sold as model "TS-A6996R" it was instead the "TS-A6996S" (reasoning for the 4/5 star review)

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers. Screws are a bit small though, and some modifications are needed because the magnets are contacting some metal in the trunk but other than that they sound great.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car speakers
customer_reviews.text: I used these in a self made boom box / Sony Head unit. Even without any expertise in speaker design, the sound is awesome. Well exceeded my expectations. I can't comment on how they would sound in a vehicle.

customer_reviews.text: man they play loud and they complete my surround in my ride every instrument i can hear.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer TS-A6996R
customer_reviews.text: These 6x9's are so much better than the previous model and has a bigger magnet. More power. Awesom highs. You will not be disappointed you purchase them.
